long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Register for webpages, forums, and other online services that you aren’t sure about without revealing your real email. 

* Crumbly enables you to generate a unique email address right at the signup page of each website, guarding your main email from data breaches and unsolicited messages. Keep your communications confidential and take charge of who has access to your contact information.

* Crumbly is not just a privacy shield; it is a signup management tool. Manage your online accounts without being overwhelmed. Crumbly remembers all the websites you’ve already signed up with the Chrome Extension menu. Simply click on the ON/OFF button and you’ll be prompted with a login or signup menu depending on whether you have an account already.

* Crumbly offers a secure space to keep your sign-up details organized and accessible. Our intuitive dashboard and tagging system provide an overview of your online signups, making it easy to locate and manage newsletter subscriptions, verification emails, and others in the right account without the guess work.

Crumbly is intended for those who want to try a service and gauge its trustworthiness before making an account with their real email. It is NOT intended to replace your real email. We do not recommend storing sensitive information including credit card details on an account created with Crumbly.
